title: Omalpe Sobhitha Thero requests places of worship to donate wealth to Treasury
body_lines: Venerable Omalpe Sobhitha Thera says all places of worship must unite at the moment to save the country from the ongoing economic crisis.
If the wealth of well-off places of worship are donated to the Treasury, a transformation that will benefit the people in the future can be witnessed, Sobhitha Thera pointed out.
